ygData.subject: Re: Best wizard equipment ! !   SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: I level till our guild s current level limit then usually help others level or look for items for our guild members.  I do not play as much as some of the
ygData.messageBody:
I level till our guild's current level limit then usually help others level
or look for items for our guild members. I do not play as much as some of
the others in our guild yet when I need to, I can often out level or catch
them very easily, and yes this includes even druids. I do not always use my
leveling techniques, as I like to adventure and hang out with and group with
others, but those that have seen me in action are impressed =) And no I do
not exploit, I use our class' abilities in ways that other classes can not
come close to...

btw this is my 3rd char...

James
Euros Arcane - lvl 27 wiz - Rallos Zek



-----Original Message-----
From: Zinken [mailto:zinken@...]
Sent: Friday, June 19, 1998 3:45 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Best wizard equipment ! ! SPOILER


From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>

If you know how to level so fast how come you aint more then lv 27 ????
